package Lec9;

public class Min {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int[] arr = { 10, -3, 90, 7, -9, 79, -18, 902 };
		System.out.println(Minimum(arr));

	}

	public static int Minimum(int[] arr) {

		int min = arr[0];
		for (int i = 1; i < arr.length; i++) {
			if (arr[i] < min) {
				min = arr[i];
			}

		}
		return min;

	}

}
